#include <iostream>
#include <stack>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	stack<char> sign;
	char str[101];
	int i,j,k,t;
	char s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>str;
	int count=0;
	for(i=0;str[i];i++)
	{
		if(str[i]=='A' || str[i] =='D' || str[i]=='O' || str[i]=='P' || str[i]=='Q' || str[i]=='R')
		count++;
		else if(str[i]=='B')
		count+=2;
			}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
